name: Standard Railing: Order and Symmetry
description: A simple stone guardrail that appears ordinary at first glance, but according to various apprentice artisans in Fontaine, this construction reflects the artisan's unique sense of "line aesthetics," which is that "structures that correspond create a harmonious and orderly atmosphere" â€” though, of course, the craftsperson's personal pattern-work does lend a bit of extra leeway to such order...
